subsection_content: Diet plays an important role in preventing colitis. Patients should limit processed foods in supermarkets, fast foods, greasy and fatty foods, foods containing caffeine, and stay away from alcohol, beer and cigarettes. Instead, people should drink lots of water and eat low-fat foods; increase fiber in the diet, while avoiding tension and stress; should exercise every day. In addition, people should have regular health checks to screen for diseases, detect and treat colitis early. (2)

viem dai trang.json. How to prevent colitis
Diet plays an important role in preventing colitis. Patients should limit processed foods in supermarkets, fast foods, greasy and fatty foods, foods containing caffeine, and stay away from alcohol, beer and cigarettes. Instead, people should drink lots of water and eat low-fat foods; increase fiber in the diet, while avoiding tension and stress; should exercise every day. In addition, people should have regular health checks to screen for diseases, detect and treat colitis early. (2)
